Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 3 , Balearic Sea: 1 , Ionian Sea: 8 ;
total: 12 .
Remarks: This is a rare subtidal/intertidal species known only from the Mediterranean basin, reported from sand and coralligenous debris.
